title: This might be more a news story than a my reporter question...  How can a bear have been terrorizing neighborhoods off Middle Sound Loop for over a week with minimal press coverage, no warning (other than amongst ourselves and social media) to the general public in the area, and the county saying they can\'t do anything other than send out animal control for calls (which takes to long- it is gone by the time they show up).  Do we need a pet or child killed before the county takes this seriously?
